title: Drawing, "St.George and the Dragon by Raphael; Biblical Scene; Disposition by Caravaggio; Ero e Leandro; Love by Lambert Sustris; Spinning Girl by Domenico Fetti; Verso: Apollo and Muse by Poussin; Cupid by Corregio; St. Peter and St. John by Poussin; Madonna...."
medium: Pen and brown ink over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: St.George and the Dragon by Raphael; Biblical Scene; Disposition by Caravaggio; Ero e Leandro; Love by Lambert Sustris; Spinning Girl by Domenico Fetti; Verso: Apollo and Muse by Poussin; Cupid by Correggio; St. Peter and St. John by Poussin; Madonna with child and St. John by Raphael; Baby Moses tramples on Pharos’s crown by Poussin; Caravaggesque pictures.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "St.George and the Dragon by Raphael; Biblical Scene; Disposition by Caravaggio; Ero e Leandro; Love by Lambert Sustris; Spinning Girl by Domenico Fetti; Verso: Apollo and Muse by Poussin; Cupid by Corregio; St. Peter and St. John by Poussin; Madonna....".
Pen and brown ink over traces of graphite on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2724.
